content:
Goal: save our time by automating mental work with bots & language tech
Hobbies: meditation, reading sci-fi, & learning machine learning
Recent Projects:
Scholar Stats - scientometrics toolset
 provides enhanced citations analysis for scientific community built using Python, Selenium webdriver, Altair, Docker, Google Cloud Run & App Engine delivers more meaningful profiles statistics by scraping and wrangling data from Google Scholar profiles  QuickSlack - knowledge management for Slack
 provides semantic search and contextual auto-suggestion for Slack using a chatbot built with Pytorch, HuggingFace, Spotify’s Annoy index, Docker swarm, Amazon EC2, Rasa serves fine-tuned, transformer-based language model and approximate nearest-neighbors search indexes
